name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "@dlghq/dialog-utils",
  "version": "0.10.9",
  "description": "A collection of utility libraries used by Dialog projects.",
  "main": "src/index.js",
  "files": [
    "src",
    "lib"
  ],
  "scripts": {
    "pretest": "eslint src/ && flow check",
    "test": "jest",
    "predocs": "rimraf docs/",
    "docs": "esdoc -c esdoc.json",
    "postdocs": "buildbranch gh-pages docs '' no-verify",
    "preversion": "npm test",
    "postversion": "npm run release",
    "postpublish": "git push --follow-tags",
    "release": "npm publish",
    "postrelease": "npm run docs",
    "fmt": "prettier '**/**/*.{js,json,css,md,html}' --write"
  },
  "repository": "git@github.com:dialogs/dialog-js-utils.git",
  "author": "Nikita Gusakov <gusnkt@gmail.com>",
  "contributors": [
    {
      "name": "Oleg Shilov",
      "email": "me@olegshilov.com",
      "url": "https://github.com/olegshilov"
    }
  ],
  "license": "Apache-2.0",
  "devDependencies": {
    "@babel/core": "7.5.5",
    "@dlghq/babel-preset-dialog": "4.4.0",
    "@dlghq/eslint-config-dialog": "4.0.10",
    "babel-core": "7.0.0-bridge.0",
    "babel-jest": "24.8.0",
    "babel-preset-jest": "23.2.0",
    "buildbranch": "2.0.1",
    "esdoc": "1.1.0",
    "esdoc-flow-type-plugin": "1.1.0",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "1.0.0",
    "eslint": "6.2.2",
    "eslint-config-prettier": "6.0.0",
    "flow-bin": "0.122.0",
    "husky": "2.7.0",
    "jest-cli": "24.8.0",
    "lint-staged": "8.2.1",
    "prettier": "1.18.2",
    "rimraf": "2.6.3"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "immutable": "4.0.0-rc.12",
    "lodash": "4.17.14"
  },
  "husky": {
    "hooks": {
      "pre-commit": "lint-staged"
    }
  },
  "lint-staged": {
    "*.--write": [
      "prettier --write",
      "git add"
    ],
    "*.js": [
      "eslint --fix",
      "git add"
    ]
  }
}
name: package.json
